title: Atlantis: Fall of the Gods
description: "Atlantis: Fall of the Gods" is the second installment of David Speight's Atlantis trilogy. It tells the story of man's flaws paving the way to Atlantis' probable demise. It follows Aedon in his quest and personal battles, as well as Faeraud in his own realizations. When the Asterians are in danger of elimination, Aedon must make some hard choices between helping them or following his friends reasoning. It is about ones beliefs clashing with faith in the supernatural.
author: David Speight
